QueryViewSpec.Name: Active Sponsorships With Inactive Recurring Gift Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to find active sponsorships with cancelled or completed recurring gifts
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select distinct SPONSORSHIP.ID, BATCH.BATCHNUMBER, f_trans.CONSTITUENTID, so_child.ID CHILDID, sponsor.LOOKUPID SPONSORLOOKUPID, sponsor.NAME SPONSORNAME, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME, r_sch.STATUS RECURRINGGIFTSTATUS from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE r_sch join dbo.financialtransaction f_trans on f_trans.id = r_sch.id join dbo.CONSTITUENT sponsor ON sponsor.ID = f_trans.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.BATCHREVENUE br on br.CONSTITUENTID = sponsor.ID join dbo.BATCH on br.BATCHID = BATCH.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT r_split on r_sch.ID = r_split.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP on SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID = r_split.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
where f_trans.TYPECODE = 2 --recurring gift and r_sch.STATUSCODE not in (0,1) --active, held and SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1
